trans-unit.source: Free and open source text editor designed and implemented by Jackie (Jiaqi) Liu
trans-unit.target: Jackie (Jiaqi) Liu 가 제작한 무료 오픈소스 텍스트 에디터

trans-unit.note: AboutPage Notepads AuthorContacts Title display text.

trans-unit.source: For issue reporting and feature requests:
trans-unit.note: AboutPage Notepads IssueAndFeatureRequests Title display text.

trans-unit.source: Source code is available on Github:
trans-unit.note: AboutPage Notepads SourceCode Title display text.

trans-unit.source: For more info, please visit our website:
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 우리의 웹 사이트를 방문하십시오:
trans-unit.note: AboutPage Notepads Website Title display text.
AdvancedPage StatusBarSettings ShowHideStatusBarToggleSwitch Off display text.
AdvancedPage StatusBarSettings ShowHideStatusBarToggleSwitch On display text.
PersonalizationPage AccentColorSettings UseWindowsAccentColorToggleSwitch Off display text.
PersonalizationPage AccentColorSettings UseWindowsAccentColorToggleSwitch On display text.

trans-unit.source: Acrylic background tint opacity. Please note that Acrylic effect will be disabled when battery saver mode is on or if you turn off transparency effects in Windows Settings.
trans-unit.target: 아크릴 배경 색조 불투명도. 아크릴 효과의 경우 기기가 절전 모드로 전환되거나 Windows 설정에서 투명 효과를 끌 때 비활성화됨에 유의하십시오.

trans-unit.note: PersonalizationPage ThemeModeSettings DarkModeRadioButton content display text.
PersonalizationPage ThemeModeSettings LightModeRadioButton content display text.
PersonalizationPage ThemeModeSettings WindowsModeRadioButton content display text.
TextAndEditorPage DecodingSettings AnsiRadioButton content display text.

trans-unit.source: Fallback decoding will be used when a file's encoding cannot be recognized.
trans-unit.target: 파일 인코딩을 인식할 수 없는 경우 대체 설정이 적용됩니다.

trans-unit.note: TextAndEditorPage DecodingSettings Utf8RadioButton content display text.
TextAndEditorPage TabKeySettings DefaultRadioButton content display text.

trans-unit.source: Settings for tab key behavior, only apply to new tabs inserted by user.
trans-unit.target: 탭 키 동작 설정은 사용자가 삽입한 새 탭에만 적용됩니다.

trans-unit.note: TextAndEditorPage TabKeySettings EightSpacesRadioButton content display text.
TextAndEditorPage TabKeySettings FourSpacesRadioButton content display text.
TextAndEditorPage TabKeySettings TwoSpacesRadioButton content display text.
TextAndEditorPage TextWrappingSettings ToggleSwitch Off display text.
TextAndEditorPage TextWrappingSettings ToggleSwitch On display text.

trans-unit.source: Once enabled, Notepads will remember the current session for next launch and do a periodic session snapshot backup to prevent accidental data loss for uncommitted changes. Notepads will NOT remind you to save your work on app close if this feature is enabled. Please also remember that session snapshot only works in the first or main window of Notepads.
trans-unit.target: 활성화되면 메모장은 다음 실행을 위해 현재 세션을 기억하고 저장되지 않은 변경으로 인한 우발적인 데이터 손실을 방지하기 위해 주기적으로 세션 스냅샷을 백업합니다. 이 기능이 활성화 된 경우 종료 시에 변경 사항을 저장하라는 메시지를 표시하지 않습니다. 세션 스냅샷은 메모장의 첫 번째 또는 기본 창에서만 작동합니다.

trans-unit.note: AdvancedPage SessionSnapshotSettings OnOffToggleSwitch On display text.
AdvancedPage SessionSnapshotSettings OnOffToggleSwitch Off display text.
TextAndEditorPage SpellingSettings HighlightMisspelledWordsToggleSwitch Off display text.
TextAndEditorPage SpellingSettings HighlightMisspelledWordsToggleSwitch On display text.

trans-unit.source: Once enabled, Notepads will always open file in a new window instead of creating a new tab.
trans-unit.target: 활성화되면 메모장은 항상 새 탭을 만드는 대신 새 창에서 파일을 엽니다.
trans-unit.note: AdvancedPage LaunchPreferenceSettings AlwaysOpenNewWindow Description display text.
AdvancedPage LaunchPreferenceSettings AlwaysOpenNewWindow OnOffToggleSwitch Off display text.
AdvancedPage LaunchPreferenceSettings AlwaysOpenNewWindow OnOffToggleSwitch On display text.
TextAndEditorPage LineHighlighterSettings ToggleSwitch Off display text.
TextAndEditorPage LineHighlighterSettings ToggleSwitch On display text.
TextAndEditorPage CustomSearchUrl Textbox display text when entered text is not a valid format.

trans-unit.source: Settings for default search engine choosen when a web search is done.
trans-unit.target: 웹 검색 수행 시 선택된 기본 검색 엔진에 대한 설정입니다.

trans-unit.note: TextAndEditorPage DecodingSettings AutoGuessDecodingRadioButton content display text.

trans-unit.source: Display line numbers in the document.

trans-unit.note: TextAndEditorPage LineNumbersSettings ToggleSwitch Off display text.
TextAndEditorPage LineNumbersSettings ToggleSwitch On display text.

trans-unit.source: Choose a custom language to override system default language used in Notepads. Restart is required to complete changes.
trans-unit.target: 메모장에서 시스템 기본 언어를 무시하고 사용할 언어를 지정하십시오. 변경 사항을 적용하려면 앱을 재시작해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Once enabled, Notepads will smartly trim leading and trailing spaces, tabs, and empty lines before copying the selected text to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 사용하면 메모장에서는 선택한 글자를 클립보드로 복사하기 전에 앞뒤의 공백, 탭, 빈 줄을 제거합니다.

trans-unit.note: AdvancedPage SmartCopySettings EnableSmartCopyToggleSwitch Off display text.
AdvancedPage SmartCopySettings EnableSmartCopyToggleSwitch On display text.
AdvancedPage LanguagePreferenceSettings System Default option text.

trans-unit.source: Exit app when closing last tab
trans-unit.note: AdvancedPage AppLifecyclePreferenceSettings ExitingLastTabClosesWindowToggleSwitch Off display text.

trans-unit.source: Exit app when closing last tab
trans-unit.note: AdvancedPage AppLifecyclePreferenceSettings ExitingLastTabClosesWindowToggleSwitch On display text.
AdvancedPage LaunchPreferenceSettings UntitledTimeStamp OnOffToggleSwitch Off display text.

trans-unit.source: Add date time suffix to Untiled name
trans-unit.note: AdvancedPage LaunchPreferenceSettings UntitledTimeStamp OnOffToggleSwitch On display text.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the changes?
Nothing to share because no text is selected and current document is empty.
trans-unit.target: 선택된 텍스트가 없고 현재 문서가 비어 있기 때문에 공유할 것이 없습니다.
trans-unit.note: ContentSharing: Failure message when user trying to share empty content.
DiffViewer: Header's text for new text (After changes).
DiffViewer: Header's text for old text (Before changes).

trans-unit.source: Notepads does not support file greater than 1MB at this moment.
trans-unit.target: Notepads 는 현재 1MB 이상의 파일을 지원하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.note: FileOpenErrorDialog: "Content" display text, {0} stands for file path, {1} stands for error message. You can change the order but DO NOT REMOVE them from the string.
FileSaveErrorDialog: "Content" display text, {0} stands for file path, {1} stands for error message. You can change the order but DO NOT REMOVE them from the string.

FindAndReplace: Notification message when target not found.
FindAndReplace: "Replace All" button tool tip display text.
FindAndReplace: "Replace" button tool tip display text.
FindAndReplace: "Find Next" button tool tip display text.
FindAndReplace: "SearchOptions" button tool tip display text.
FindAndReplace: "Match Whole Word" OptionToggleButton display text.

trans-unit.source: All changes including text, line ending and encoding made to "{0}" will be reverted!
trans-unit.target: 파일 "{0}" 의 모든 변경 사항이 원래대로 돌아갑니다!
trans-unit.note: RevertAllChangesConfirmationDialog: "Content" display text, {0} stands for file name. You can change the order but DO NOT REMOVE it from the string.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure to revert all changes?

trans-unit.note: SetCloseSaveReminderDialog: "Content" display text. {0} stands for file name/path. You can change the order but DO NOT REMOVE it from the string.

Tab: ContextFlyout "Close to the Right" button display text.
Tab: ContextFlyout "Close Saved" button display text.
Tab: ContextFlyout "Copy Full Path" button display text.
Tab: ContextFlyout "Open Containing Folder" button display text.
TextEditor: ContextFlyout "Toggle Preview" button display text.
TextEditor: ContextFlyout "Select All" button display text.
TextEditor: ContextFlyout "Share Selected" button display text.
TextEditor: ContextFlyout "Word Wrap" toggle button display text.
TextEditor: Default file name for new document.

TextEditor: LineColumnIndicator display text when character(s) is(are) selected. {0} stands for line number, {1} stands for column index, {2} stands for number of selected characters, {3} stands for "selected" (based on singular and plural). You can change the order but DO NOT REMOVE them from the string.
TextEditor: LineColumnIndicator display text when no character is selected. {0} stands for line number, {1} stands for column index. You can change the order but DO NOT REMOVE them from the string.
TextEditor: ModificationIndicator "PreviewTextChanges" MenuFlyoutItem display text. DiffViewer will be shown upon selection.
TextEditor: ModificationIndicator "RevertAllChanges" MenuFlyoutItem display text. All changes including text, encoding and line ending will be reverted to original state upon selection.
TextEditor: Notification message when user tap or click file name/path on status bar (Bottom left corner).
TextEditor: Notification message when file has been saved successfully.

trans-unit.source: Press F11 to exit full screen
trans-unit.note: TextEditor: Notification message when app entering full screen mode.
TextEditor: FileModifiedOutsideIndicator tool tip display text.

trans-unit.source: File has been moved, renamed or deleted!
trans-unit.target: 파일이 이동, 이름 변경 또는 삭제되었습니다!
trans-unit.note: TextEditor: FileRenamedMovedOrDeletedIndicator tool tip display text.
TextEditor: Notification message when file has been reloaded successfully.
TextEditor: Plural form for the selected word count indicator. Leave it with the same value of SingularSelectedWord if your language doesen't have a plural form.
TextEditor: Singular form for the selected word count indicator.
App: DragAndDrop UIOverride Caption: "Move tab here" display text
App: DragAndDrop UIOverride Caption: "Open with Notepads" display text

trans-unit.source: This is a shadow window of Notepads. Session snapshot and settings are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 이 창은 Shadow Window입니다. 세션 스냅샷 설정이 비활성화 되었습니다.

trans-unit.note: TextEditor: Notification message when file has been opened in current app instance.

JumpList: Windows Taskbar JumpList Items "New window" item display text.
GoTo: Go to bar placeholder text.

trans-unit.source: Line number exceeds beyond the total number of lines!
trans-unit.target: 줄 번호가 이 파일의 줄 수를 초과합니다!
trans-unit.note: GoTo: Notification message when input exceeds input limit.

trans-unit.source: You can only type a number!
trans-unit.note: GoTo: Notification message when invalid input entered.
GoTo: "Search" button tool tip display text.
TextEditor: ContextFlyout "Web Search" button display text.
TextEditor: FontZoomIndicator "Restore Default Zoom" FlyoutItem display text. Restores to default zoom for selected text editor.
TextEditor: FontZoomIndicator "ZoomIn" FlyoutItem display text. Zooms in selected text editor text.
TextEditor: FontZoomIndicator "ZoomOut" FlyoutItem display text. Zooms out selected text editor text.
FindAndReplace: "Use Regular Expression" OptionToggleButton display text.

trans-unit.source: Can only accept upto one decimal place
trans-unit.note: Print: Error message when decimal places for margin entry exceeds limit.
Print: Error message when value for margin entry exceeds limit.
Print: PrintManager custom option "LeftMargin" and "TopMargin" description.
Print: Notification message when error occurs while showing print ui.
Print: Notification message on print failure.

trans-unit.source: Printing is not supported on this device
trans-unit.note: Print: Notification message when printing attempted in a non-supported device.
MainMenu: "Open Recent" button ClearRecentlyOpenedSubItem display text.
TextEditor: EncodingIndicator "More Encodings" FlyoutItem display text.
TextEditor: EncodingIndicator "Reopen with Encoding" FlyoutItem display text.
TextEditor: EncodingIndicator "Save with Encoding" FlyoutItem display text.
FindAndReplace: Notification message when regular expression text is invalid.
TextEditor: EncodingIndicator "Auto Guess Encoding" FlyoutItem display text.
TextEditor: Notification message when file's encoding cannot be determined.
FindAndReplace: "Find Previous" button tool tip display text.
FindAndReplace: "Toggle Replace Mode" button tool tip display text.
TextEditor: ContextFlyout "Right-to-Left Reading order" toggle button display text.

trans-unit.source: File name should not contain invalid characters
trans-unit.target: 파일 이름에 유효하지 않은 문자가 포함되어서는 안 됩니다

trans-unit.source: File name should not contain leading spaces
trans-unit.target: 파일 이름의 첫머리에 공백이 와서는 안 됩니다

trans-unit.source: File name should not contain trailing spaces
trans-unit.target: 파일 이름의 끝에 공백이 붙어서는 안 됩니다

trans-unit.source: File name cannot be empty or all whitespace
trans-unit.target: 파일 이름을 비워두거나 공백만으로 구성해서는 안 됩니다
trans-unit.note: InvalidFilenameError: Filename is empty or contains all whitespace.

trans-unit.source: File name is invalid or not allowed
trans-unit.target: 유효하지 않거나 허용되지 않은 파일 이름입니다
trans-unit.note: InvalidFilenameError: Filename is invalid or not allowed.

trans-unit.source: File name cannot be longer than 255 characters
trans-unit.note: InvalidFilenameError: Filename is longer than 255 characters.
TextEditor: Notification message when file has been renamed successfully.

trans-unit.source: Empty file extension is not supported at this moment
trans-unit.target: 현재는 빈 파일 확장자를 지원하지 않습니다
trans-unit.note: FileRenameError: Empty file extension is not currently supported.

trans-unit.source: File extension "{0}" is not supported at this moment
trans-unit.note: FileRenameError: Extension is not currently supported. {0} stands for the file extension string.
